#description of menu behavior

I want the menu system to merge cleanly with the game. The main menu will run on a pre-generated game board, so the player can opt to start a game with one click.

Different menu items will be placed over different on-screen obstacles, or over open areas. It will try to maintain a coherent layout, but vary depending on the screen position.
